alert.note: Alert for Northern Carbon; Northern Stillwater; Red Lodge Foothills (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 6:13PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Stillwater and north central Carbon Counties through 645 PM MDT... At 613 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 16 miles northwest of Columbus to 11 miles southeast of Absarokee. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Columbus, Joliet, Fromberg, Halfbreed Lake Wildlife, Edgar, Boyd, Hailstone Wildlife Refuge, Roberts, Silesia, Cooney Reservoir State Park, Park City, Rockvale and Rapelje. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
